Refer to File No. NARAIN 0 SIKRI C/O SANDIP SIMRI 6 WINDMILL CT SILVER SPRING MD 22385- 27 08/98 LIN-98-180-52148 INBM001 R.: REQUEST FOR EVIDENCE THE INITIAL DOCOMENTATION SUBMITTED WITH YOUR FORM I-131, (Application for Travel Document) IS NOT SUFFICIENT TO WARRANT FAVORABLE CONSIDERATION OF YOUR APPLICATION Submittal of the following items and/or additional information will assist in the processing of your application Please submit or comply with the items checked below: of you are a lawful permanent resident or conditional resident you must submit documentation verifying your status To be accepted as evidence the documentation 7135 clearly show your status provide your biographic information and must include Any of the following may be accepted as evidence of your lawful permanent conditional resident status: a photocopy of your 2-551 Alien Registration Card (ARC), showing both the back and front sides as proof of your status as a Lawful permanent or conditional resident of the United States The copies must clearly show your photograph and card information : If you have not received your Allen Registration Card submit a copy of the biographic page and the page of your passport indicating initial admission as 3 permanent or conditional resident of other evidence that you are a permanent or conditional resident Or, : A copy of the approval notice a separate application for replacement of your ailen Lictration card or temporary evidence of permanent or conditional resident status (1315) A) 2. Submit evidence that you qualify as a refugee for the purpose of issuance of a refugee travel document To qualify you must have been admitted paroled or granted in the United States as a refuge or an asylee or you must have been admitted 02 adjusted to Lawful permanent resident status based on a refugee or asylee claim must submit a photocopy of your I-94 card, your I-551 or card (both front and back which clearly shows the photo and identity information) appropriate employment authorization card both front and back also) or other docume ation to show that you have been granted a status making you eligible for a refugee travel document : you do not have an allen registration card you must submit a copy of your Form I-94 along with a copy of a photo identity document such as a passport a driver's license or another document showing your photo your name and date of birth The identity document copy must clearly show the photograph and identity information (1310) 3 Since becoming a Permanent Resident (or during the past five years, whichever is less now muss total time have you spent outside the United STATES?
